transcript:
Customer: Hello. Hello.
Executive: Namaskar sir. Hello.
Customer: Hello. Haan. Sir, main Hemant Patole baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji sir, abhi aapne call kiya tha. Abhi aapki ek ticket open hui hai, kuch issue aa raha tha kya?
Customer: Are wo Piyush sir ko main phone laga raha tha. To wohi phone uthate hain na ye help ka?
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Are Piyush sir hain na ek, woh phone uthate hain na ye?
Executive: Aapke yahan se Priyanshi uthate hain.
Customer: Haan, Priyanshi.
Executive: Haan, haan, sir unhone office chhod diya hai abhi. To kyun?
Customer: Unka kuch personal reason hoga. Woh main bata nahi sakta hun, woh mamuli si thoda. Achha. To unki jagah kaun hai phir?
Customer: Sir main hi hun. Mera naam Hemant Patole ji, aapka account dekh pa raha hun.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Achha, to phir mere account manager bhi aap hi hoge?
Executive: Ji, ji, sir, ji.
Customer: Achha, mere account manager bhi aap hi ho?
Executive: Ji, ji, sir, ji.
Customer: Achha. Ji sir, abhi aap mujhe bata sakte hain kya problem face kar rahe the sir aap?
Executive: Problem kya hai sir, jo maine jaise apna plan liya tha one year ka. To usme main itne dinon se roj lead le raha hun, buylead roj main consume kar raha hun, abhi tak ek bhi grahak nahi aaya. To Priyansh sir se meri beech mein baat hui thi Diwali ke ek hafte pehle. Matlab 10 din pehle kareeban. To sir ne kisi ko online leke matlab video call pe baat karai thi. To woh woh bol rahe the ki aap ek hafte dekh lo. Agar aapka business hota hai to thik hai. Nahi to hum payment ka dekhenge refund ka, kaise kya hoga. To usi ke liye main phone laga raha tha, teen din, teen din se sir mera phone nahi utha rahe the.
Executive: Haan Priyanshu. Ji, main samajh gaya. Haan. Sir unhone office chhod diya actually mein. Main main samajh gaya, woh koi nahi. To ab mera kaam kaise kya hoga?
Customer: Abhi aapko business nahi mil raha IndiaMART ke through sir?
Executive: Nahi mil raha. Mere ko aap meri ID pe dekh sakte ho. Kitne dinon se main buylead consume kar raha hun. Aur unhe main kam se kam 20 din se unhe main daily ki woh bhej raha hun. Kya kis, kis buyer se kya baat hui hai, kya nahi hui hai, sab unko update de raha tha main. Unhone kahi thi 10, 7, 8 din bhar ki update mere ko puri do. Mere ko 15 din ho chuke the.
Executive: Thik hai, matlab aap buyer se bhi connect kar rahe hain lekin kuch response nahi aa raha hai isme?
Customer: Haan, kuch nahi aa raha.
Executive: Koi response nahi aa raha hai. Haan. To unhone kisi se baat karai thi meri. To woh keh rahe the hum kar denge tumhara refund vagera ka ho jayega jo bhi hoga. To maine ki 6, 7 mahine ka jo bhi kate woh kaat ke.
Customer: Thik hai, ek minute sir main refund ka ek baar dekh leta hun. Dekh lo bhai, kyunki main bahut pareshan hun, aap meri ID bhi dekh sakte ho. Maine ₹37,000 kuch bhare the. Mera abhi tak ₹1 ka business nahi hua hai ye mano.
Executive: Ek minute. Aapne ye service liya tha sir September 2023 ko. Abhi liya hai, yani ki September mein hi liya hai abhi aapne.
Customer: Haan, September, October. Do mahine hue na pure? Haan, haan, do mahine hue. Do mahine mein sir aapne ₹37,000 IndiaMART ko diye. To sir aapko ek paise ka bhi dhandha nahi mila kya IndiaMART se?
Executive: Ek paise ka bhi nahi hua sir. Isliye maine ek mahina maine pura diya tha. Uske baad maine phone lagaya tha, sir ne meri baat karai thi. To woh jo samne wale ek aur sir the woh yahi bol rahe the ki aap hafta bhar aur dekho hamare kehne pe. Aur daily ki humko khabar do, to main daily ki unhe khabar deta tha. Ye mano. To us pe bhi kuch nahi hua. Kaiyon logon se unhone bhi khud ne bhi baat karke dekhi. To bhi koi fayda nahi hua. To unhone boli thi Diwali ke pehle ki hafte bhar dekho, uske baad aapka refund karwa denge. To maine ki thik hai. To ab woh teen din se phone hi nahi utha rahe the. Ab unki jagah aap ho to sir aap madad karo kuch. Ji, unhone refund ke liye bola tha. Aur sir Priyanshi ke sath mein kaun tha? Woh aap unka naam bata sakte hain ji? Unke manager the?
Customer: Naam nahi bata sakta sir main. Sir woh bol rahe the humse upar wale manager hain koi. Thik hai, samajh gaya main. Unke upar wale manager. Haan. Lekin abhi sir IndiaMART ki taraf se aapko call vagera to aate hain na? Abhi call vagera to? Main apna data. Koi call vagera nahi aate sir. Main hi lagata hun jo bhi lagata hun. Yahan pe abhi jo main dekh raha hun sir, woh aapke do number mein hai. Ek to jo koi 60 se aur ek dusra wala hai 93 se jo start ho raha hai. Dono number map hai na sir ye? Haan, haan, dono number add hain lekin woh jo pehla number hai na us pe machine vagera ke pehle call aate the jab humne plan nahi liya tha. Achha, pehle aate the? Haan, haan. Jab humne plan nahi liya tha jab aate the. Plan liya jab se dono hi number pe phone nahi aa rahe hain. Ab dono number pe. Lekin sir main check kar raha hun to yahan pe inquiry vagera bhi aapke paas October mein to aayi hain sir kam se kam. Inquiry mere paas suno na. Inquiry aati hain lekin woh inquiry maine sare pata hai sab pe baat karke unko bheja hai. To woh inquiry aise hain ki woh keh rahi hain humse maal lo. Samajh rahe hain aap? Ji sir. Woh khud, woh khud buyer dhundh rahi hain. Jaise main buyer dhundh raha hun na, aise woh khud buyer dhundh rahi hain. To mujhe message kar rahi hain aapko maal chahiye to hum aapko photo bhej dete hain. Phir main unse kehta hun bhaiya main khud bana raha hun. To phir woh rehne deti hain. Aisa ho raha hai. Haan, jo aap abhi October mein Diwali ke aas paas ki jo dekh rahe hoge 5, 6, 6, 7 aayi hain kam se kam inquiry aayi hain woh aisi hain. Ek to transport ki thi. Jaise sir aap jo abhi apna business kar rahe hain, woh aap jo buyleads vagera chahiye, buyleads vagera use kar rahe ho, uske baad bhi aapko dhandha nahi mil raha hai? Nahi. To sir issue kahan pe aa raha hai sir? Aapne IndiaMART ko paisa diya, IndiaMART ne aapko buylead di. Buylead aap phir buyer kya bol raha hai aapko? Kyunki abhi jo main check kar raha hun. Meri baat suno. Buylead jo abhi, abhi sab jo main abhi buylead check kar raha hun. Jaise maan lijiye abhi aapka jo dhandha hai woh aap karte ho MP se Gwalior se. To aap pan India karoge na sir all over India ya phir nahi karoge? Haan, haan. Nahi, all over India. All over India karoge. Jaise maan lijiye sir aapke paas mein Rajasthan se koi bhi buylead aayi aapne woh consume kari. Uske baad mein to IndiaMART ko iska matlab aap dono ke beech mein nahi rahega na? Ab buyer se aapki kya baat hui? Haan. Ab buyer ne phir kya bola? Uske baad bhi convert nahi ho raha hai kya buyer? Nahi ho raha na. Buyer ye kehta hai hamein chahiye hi nahi. Humne dekha hi nahi hai, humne kuch kara hi nahi hai, ye bol deta hai. To ab main usme kya karun ye batao na aap. Maine kaiyon baar buyer se baat kari, buyer kehta hai nahi humne nahi kiya, galti se ho gaya hoga. Pata nahi kisne kiya hai, kisi rishtedar ne kar diya hoga, kisi bachche ne kar diya hoga. 90% to ye issue aa raha hai. Thik hai. Main kahan se confirm karun isko ye batao. Line pe rahiye, main sir se baat kar leta hun ek minute se. Hmm. Ek minute line pe hi rahiye sir. Hmm.

Hello? Haan. Haan sir, maine abhi sir se baat kari hai apna jo aapke rahe the. Woh bol rahe hain ki refund policy to hai nahi sir. Refund to hum nahi kara sakte hain. To Priyanshu ne kuch base se bola tha ki aapko refund karate hain. Nahi, Priyanshi sir, Priyanshi sir ne nahi boli thi. Jo ek aur sir jinse baat hui thi woh keh rahe the hum dekh lenge ek hafte aap hamare kehne pe dekho. Ye bol rahe the. Woh sahi hai sir. Woh sahi hai sir. Refund to kyunki abhi jab maine recently join kiya to mujhe aisi koi matlab policy nahi batai gayi ki refund kara sakte hain. To refund ka to option nahi hai lekin sir main solution aapko jarur dilwa sakta hun aapke sath kaam karke. Aapko buyer de sakta hun continue. Aapke call call aaye agar aapko kuch issue aa raha hai to main main bhi attend kar sakta hun aapke sath mein. Itna to sir main kar sakta hun, aapki help kar sakta hun har tarike se. Aap jab bhi bolenge tab main call attend karunga aapke help ke liye. Hmm. Aur buyleads vagera bhi main aapko link de sakta hun. Aur bataiye sir aur main kya kar sakta hun kyunki refund policy to nahi hai sir abhi. To sir ye baat hi khatam ho gayi phir to ye ullu banane wali baat ho gayi sir. Ki agle ne pehle apne sir se baat karai, unhone kahi ek mahine dekho aap, 15 din dekho. Aur phir ab woh chhod ke chale gaye to aap puri baat palat rahe hain sir. Nahi sir main main kahan palat raha hun sir? Ab mujhe to aapke case ke bare mein bhi pata nahi. Nahi samne, nahi nahi samne wale ne jo baat kari thi woh to puri baat palat gayi na. Nahi sir woh ab main wahi to puch raha hun ki aapko kisne bola? Aap aap bol rahe ho ki aapko naam nahi pata to ab main sir naam nahi pata. Dekho na ab ek baat meri baat suno abhi aap baat kar rahe ho mere se thik hai. Abhi aap kisi ko jod ke baat karao to mere ko uski uska naam kaise pata hoga? Nahi woh woh video call pe jab woh aapke sath aaye honge unhone apna name to bataya hoga na ki main ye baat kar raha hun ya phir mera jaise maine bataya ki main Hemant baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se. Haan. To then aapko pata chalega ki Priyanshi se pehli baar baat hui thi meri, aap samajh rahe ho? Meri unse ek hi baar baat hui thi. Ek hi baar baat hui. To sir ab ye mano ab Diwali ke kam se kam 15 din pehle baat hui thi. Ab mahina bhar ho gaya woh ek baar kisi ne naam bola ab main mahine bhar kaise yaad rakhunga? Ab main ulta seedha naam to le nahi sakta na phir aap kahoge kal aap galat bol rahe ho. To woh bhi galat hoga na sir. Main kisi ka bhi naam nahi le sakta na. Woh baat sahi hai sir aap kisi ka aise naam nahi le sakte woh to galat effect padta hai. Lekin abhi jo main keh raha hun. Hmm. Abhi jo sir maine manager sir se baat kari hai, woh refund policy to nahi hai sir bilkul kuch bhi. Aur refund to mere end se nahi ho payega kyunki hota to main bilkul try kar pata sir aapke sath. To main ye main main ye maan lun meri baat suno main ye maan lun daka dal gaya seedhi seedhi baat ye hai. Nahi sir daka nahi sir daka nahi dala. Kyunki sir abhi aapka sir dekho na aap meri aap meri baat aap meri baat samjhoge sir. Aap apne jaise sochna samajhna thik hai. Jaise aapne kahin paise bhare do mahina ho gaya do mahine mein kitni buylead consume kari hain ye aap dekh sakte ho. Haan. Ek bhi grahak ne ek single piece nahi liya. Aap ye bhi samajh sakte ho agar apan ₹37-38,000 bhare ke bhar ke agar do mahine mein ek bhi piece sell nahi hoga to phir kya matlab niklega ye batao aap. Aap ye dekho na sir. To ye to daka dal nahi ho gaya na sir mere liye to. Koi main do mahine se laga hua hun continue jab main ek piece nahi bech paya online se aur maine offline to bhi maine 100 piece bech liye. To phir mere liye to ₹37-38,000 pure pani mein gaye. Matlab sare aam loot ho gayi ye maan lo. Sir mujhe aadha ghante ka time dijiye main upar baat kar raha hun aur main apne senior se ek baar aur baat karta hun. Aap aap aap imandari sir apne aap ko meri jagah rakh ke dekho phir aap batana ye daka dala ki nahi dala sir. Samajh gaya main aapki baat aapne invest kiya hai aap. Wahi maine Priyanshu sir se bhi maine wohi kahi thi unhone jisse baat karai thi unse hi maine wohi kahi thi maine sir aap apne aap ko meri jagah rakh ke dekho. Phir aap socho. Samajh rahe ho maine paise kake liye bhare the sir business ke liye ki mera maal jayega. Samajh rahe ho sir pehle meri baat hui thi to unhone boli thi aise hafte ki aapko 10 lead milti hain saat offer ki milti hain matlab hafte ki 17 lead milti hain mahine ki 70 lead kareeban hoti hain mere paas. Samajh rahe hain sir? Ji. To phir ye ye bola gaya tha ki 5 se 10% buylead consume matlab grahak maal leta hai. Maine do mahine mein kitne grahakon ko phone lagaya aap ye dekho aur usme se ek bhi grahak ne ye baat nahi kari ki mujhe tumhara maal chahiye is rate mein chahiye. Rate ka bhi issue nahi aa pa raha. Agla baat hi nahi kar raha sir. Aap ye dekho na. Nahi nahi bilkul. Meri taraf se to koi galti nahi aa pa rahi. Matlab mera maal aadmi dekhe aadmi kahe mere ko ₹20 sasta chahiye ₹15 sasta chahiye. To woh meri galti hai ki mera maal mahanga pad raha hai thik hai. Woh meri galti hogi main main uske liye main zimmedar hounga lekin aadmi baat hi nahi kar raha. Phir kya matlab hai sir ye batao na aap. Nahi nahi nahi sir iska matlab koi matlab nahi hai main samajh gaya aap main apne senior se bhi baat kar liya. Aur aap meri ID check kar sakte ho aisa nahi hai main kaam nahi kar raha hun. Main continue roj buylead consume kar raha hun roj dekh raha hun. Ye mano roj update kar raha hun aur ab hafte bhar se Diwali ke baad se meri buylead hi nahi aa rahi. Ye mano aap aap meri ID dekh sakte ho. Jo mera product nahi hai woh buylead aa rahi hain sir main unhe consume kaise karun? Buylead to sir abhi jaise maine check kari aadha ghante pehle aapke paas check Rajasthan se bhi hai Bombay se bhi hai 500 530 ka order hai. Ab ye iski guarantee to main nahi de sakta hun na ki hoga. Meri meri baat to suno meri baat to suno aap. Aap mere ko WhatsApp pe aaye bhejo main teen char din ki aapko continue ki grahak kya bol raha hai main woh aapko bhejta hun main Piyush sir ko bhejta tha Priyanshu sir ko main woh pura aapko bhejta hun ki grahak kya bolta hai mere se. Thik hai. Usse dekh ke aap batana ki main kya karun. Nahi sir main abhi aapko WhatsApp pe bhej deta hun aur main aapka senior ke sath mein main connect karata hun agar woh free ho jata hai main turant aapko call karta hun sir abhi aadha ghante. Nahi sir aise kya apan ko malum chal jaye ki nahi apna lut gaye band koi matlab nahi to main taraf dhyan hi nahi dunga na. Kya main mehnat bhi kyun karun phir agar ye sochna aap. Main ye maan lunga chori ho gayi seedhi si baat. Nahi nahi sir aisa bilkul bhi nahi hai aap aisa mat sochiye hum bilkul help karenge main bilkul hun main aapki bilkul help karunga maine abhi senior se bola hai woh busy hain. To main abhi aadha ghante main jaise hi woh free hote hain main turant aapko call karta hun. Thik hai. Thik hai. Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting business through IndiaMART.

- No calls from IndiaMART.

- Wants refund for the subscription amount.



Resolution:

- Executive said there is no refund policy.

- Executive offered to help with buyleads.

- Executive offered to connect with senior.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with senior and call back.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, subscription, account manager
